name: LabSolutions IR Data
summary: Learn about .ISPD files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Shimadzu LabSolutions IR contains a library of approximately 12,000 spectra, which it uses to identify materials. Scientists who use LabSolutions IR to identify materials can search through results using spectral search, peak search, text search, and combination search.

description: An ISPD file is a Fourier-transform infrared spectroscopy (FTIR) results file created by Shimadzu LabSolutions IR, a spectroscopy material identification program. It contains FTIR data recorded using Shimadzu LabSolutions IR.

instructions: You can open an ISPD file and view the data it contains in Shimadzu LabSolutions IR (Windows).
